ReliabilityMetrics¶

class ReliabilityMetrics.ReliabilityMetrics(FIXLOS, FIXTST, FNR, FPR, testDuration)¶

Bases: object

The reliability metrics in a VFT report

FIXLOS¶

The fixation losses.

FIXTST¶

The number of fixation tests.

FNR¶

False negative rate.

FPR¶

False positive rate.

testDuration¶

The duration of the test.

__init__(FIXLOS, FIXTST, FNR, FPR, testDuration)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
